title: Rapid Blaster Pro
paragraphs: The Rapid Blaster Pro is a main weapon in the Splatoon series, manufactured by Deco.

The Rapid Blaster Pro is a Rapid Blaster with an elongated handle and barrel, and increased range to match. Its range is the greatest of all blasters. As a trade-off, it has a slightly slower fire rate and higher ink consumption compared to the Rapid Blaster. Damage output and blast size are identical for both weapons.
The Rapid Blaster Pro is similar in appearance to the Rapid Blaster. However, the nozzle is longer, and there is a gray bar connecting the red panels at the bottom to the handle.

The Rapid Blaster Pro was released on 17 October 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It comes with Seekers and the Inkzooka. Each shot consumes 10% of the ink tank capacity, and the ink tank recovers 1.67% of its capacity between each shot, allowing the player to fire 11 shots before needing to refill on ink.

The Rapid Blaster Pro returns in Splatoon 2 looking identical to how it did in the first game. It was released on 23 September 2017 at 02:00 UTC[3]. It comes with the Toxic Mist and Ink Storm. Each shot consumes 8% of the ink tank capacity, allowing the player to fire 12 shots before needing to refill on ink.
It appears in seven Octo Expansion stations:
- B03 Spin Docto Station
- C08 Right Round Station
- F03 Pop Star Station
- F08 Jump Station
- G02 Hasta La Vista Station
- I01 G01 Toastmaster Station
- J02 Matchmaster Station

The Rapid Blaster Pro returns in Splatoon 3 with a new design. Its kit is the Toxic Mist and Ink Vac.
It appears in two missions in Return of the Mammalians:
- 0307 Rail Pass
- 0408 Easy Ride, Tricky Targets

The difference between the three versions of the Rapid Blaster Pro: The Rapid Blaster Pro Deco is the only one whose lights do not illuminate when fired. (link to file)
For competitive tips about the Rapid Blaster Pro
- This weapon resembles a toy dart blaster.

- Prior to version 3.0.0 of Splatoon 3, the colored parts on the 2D icons for the Rapid Blaster Pro and Rapid Blaster were colored yellow. This was corrected to the white color upon release of the update.
- The lights on the sides of the weapon illuminate when fired, but the second variant of the weapon, the Rapid Blaster Pro Deco, does not.
